result.Case Summary:
BEFORE THE NATIONAL ADJUDICATORY COUNCIL In the Matter of Department of Enforcement, Complainant, vs. Daniel W. Bukovcik DeWitt, MI, Respondent. DECISION Complaint No. C8A050055 Dated July 25, 2007 Respondent's signing of customer names to account documents violated NASD rules. Held, findings and sanctions modified. Appearances For the Complainant: Leo F. Orenstein, Esq., Department of Enforcement, NASD For the Respondent: Brian J. Masternak, Esq. Decision We called this matter for review pursuant to NASD
